reviews.text: Room was spacious, queen size bed. Everything was clean and working properly. Good service, friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast buffet was excellent and included in room rate. Wifi available in the room but you must pay R$15 per 24 hours and get a new password each day.
reviews.title: Okay, but there are better value options in Brasilia

reviews.text: My main dissatisfaction was that the room was audibly transparent—noise from the hallway, and traffic noise from the street (I was on 4th floor) bothered me unless I had the aircon going. No privacy curtains on the sliding glass doors, which looked across to another building. Room service and restaurant food was average quality and overpriced (e.g. R$ 39 for lasagna).
reviews.title: Fine, but would have chosen somewhere cheaper
